author: Jacob Skillin
comment: The active display version is basically just a whiteout version. It looks bad and there's not enough black pixels to save battery.

reply.author: Acorns Studio
reply.content:
Hi,Jacob
Thanks for your feedback! It's our negligence that we didn't make the ambient mode.We will add this feature in next version.
Thank you!

title: Great, except for active display

author: Paul Zimmerman
comment: Love the look but why the location permissions?

reply.author: Acorns Studio
reply.content:
Hi paul
Thanks for you feedback! It's our negligence. We will remove the location permission in the later version asap!

Thank you!
